name: Kaggle Competition Environment (built-image)
postCreateCommand: python3 -m venv .venv && ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
postStartCommand: if [ -f .venv/bin/activate ]; then . .venv/bin/activate; python -m pip check || ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt; else echo '.venv missing'; fi
